summary: <//UPDATED\\\\> Makes Nightingale armour more stealth/ranger assassin oriented, also makes leveled versions identical to highest level version. no more worrying about leveling before taking on the quest for the highest leveled set! +40% bow damage on armor and gloves, armor now have 25% resist all element.
descriptionHtml:
Everyone was very unsatisfied with the nightingale set in Skyrim, a lot of people in the thieves guild use bows and some daggers, the item set barely helps one handed uses and does a dash for illusion and leaves bow users in the dust. (if your more interested in a dagger oriented set check out my other mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20827 )

Since random items found in game can have up to +40% bow damage (hands, head, rings, necklaces) I have added these balanced stats to the nightingale armor.

This is what the mod changes.

Nightingale Hood - all versions now have 46+ version stats.
- Bows do 40% more damage, 10% better prices.

Nightingale Armor - all versions now have 46+ version stats.
- +40 stamina, 25% Resist fire, frost and shock.

Nightingale Gloves - all versions now have 46+ version stats.
25% better lock picking, 25% better pickpocket. bows do 40% more damage

Nightingale Boots - all versions now have 46+ version stats.
- Magnitude 35 muffle

Nightingale Bow - All versions now have 46+ version stats.
author: TheZombieDoctor aka Iniquitous Hitman on steam
